participant_1.name: Olivia
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Olivia loves trying new things and exploring different hobbies.
participant_1.background: I've brown curly hair. My bedroom is purple and lime green. I am a vegan. I like riding horses. I'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and passionate, Emily enjoys reading and learning about new things, especially while preparing for motherhood.
participant_2.background: I'm pregnant with my first child. I read a book every week. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. I started a new job as a PA three months ago. My favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

content.text: Hey! Do you have brown curly hair? Because I do.
I do, but not good at that either. But I do it anyway !
